QuestData.Title: Vandalizing Jotunheim
QuestData.Description: Let us see if we can further weaken the resolve of the vrykul, $n.$B$BEach day I wish you to travel to Jotunheim and put their banners to the torch. It may seem a trivial thing, but to see their ancestral home vandalized on a daily basis will demoralize them more than any physical punishment you can inflict.$B$BAt least... it can't hurt.
QuestData.LogDescription: Duke Lankral at The Shadow Vault wants you to burn 10 Vrykul Banners.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have more work to do.
QuestData.RewardText: <The duke looks at you a moment and nods.>$B$BYou're inflicting horrible mental trauma on the Jotunheim vrykul. This is where they were first reawakened. It is a place of significant importance to them, second only to Ymirheim.$B$BYou must keep up the pressure there while I hold the vault from the assault of the Lich King.
